headline.print_headline: Titans Hire Ken Whisenhunt as Their New Coach
headline.main: Titans Hire Ken Whisenhunt as Their New Coach

docs.snippet: The Tennessee Titans have wrapped up their coaching search by hiring San Diego offensive coordinator Ken Whisenhunt as their new head coach and 17th in franchise history....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Tennessee Titans have wrapped up their coaching search by hiring San Diego offensive coordinator Ken Whisenhunt as their new head coach and 17th in franchise history.

headline.main: Three Former Rabobank Traders Charged in Libor Case

docs.snippet: The Justice Department filed criminal charges on Monday against three former traders, the latest step in the investigation into the banking industry’s manipulation of interest rates....
docs.abstract: The Justice Department filed criminal charges on Monday against three former traders, the latest step in the investigation into the banking industry’s manipulation of interest rates.

headline.sub: "Death is easier than this," displaced woman in Syria

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Uber's Taxi Troubles in France, and Why 'Her' Might Offer a Glimpse of the Future

docs.snippet: Monday’s highlights from around the web include protests against Uber in Paris, where a car was attacked on a freeway. Plus, an argument for why the technology in the movie “Her” might be more like what our future will look like compared to ...
docs.abstract: Monday’s highlights from around the web include protests against Uber in Paris, where a car was attacked on a freeway. Plus, an argument for why the technology in the movie “Her” might be more like what our future will look like compared to “Minority Report.”

headline.print_headline: U.S. Lawmakers Unveil $1.1 Trillion Spending Bill, No Obamacare Increase
headline.main: U.S. Lawmakers Unveil $1.1 Trillion Spending Bill, No Obamacare Increase

docs.snippet: Negotiators in the U.S. Congress on Monday unveiled a $1.1 trillion spending bill that aims to prevent another government shutdown while boosting funding levels slightly for military and domestic programs - but not for "Obamacare" health reforms....
docs.lead_paragraph: Negotiators in the U.S. Congress on Monday unveiled a $1.1 trillion spending bill that aims to prevent another government shutdown while boosting funding levels slightly for military and domestic programs - but not for "Obamacare" health reforms.

headline.print_headline: New York State Assemblyman Found Guilty in Bribery Case
headline.main: New York State Assemblyman Found Guilty in Bribery Case

docs.snippet: A New York state assemblyman was found guilty on Monday on charges he accepted $22,000 in bribes in exchange for official acts, including securing legislation favoring a network of adult day-care centers operated by four businessmen....
docs.lead_paragraph: A New York state assemblyman was found guilty on Monday on charges he accepted $22,000 in bribes in exchange for official acts, including securing legislation favoring a network of adult day-care centers operated by four businessmen.

headline.print_headline: Officers Acquitted in California Homeless Death
headline.main: Officers Acquitted in California Homeless Death

docs.snippet: Two California police officers who were videotaped in a violent struggle with a homeless man during an arrest were acquitted Monday of killing him....

headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Murders, Violent Crime Dip to Lowest Level in Decades
headline.main: Los Angeles Murders, Violent Crime Dip to Lowest Level in Decades

docs.snippet: Murders and other serious crimes in Los Angeles dropped to more than 40-year lows in 2013, Mayor Eric Garcetti said on Monday, crediting a citywide focus on prevention and intervention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Murders and other serious crimes in Los Angeles dropped to more than 40-year lows in 2013, Mayor Eric Garcetti said on Monday, crediting a citywide focus on prevention and intervention.
